attributes.action: Require all pubs and clubs to go on lockdown with sick pay for staff
attributes.background: People are advised to stay away from pubs and clubs but they are still open as they need to pay staff and bills, if all pubs and clubs are placed on lockdown for 2 weeks with all staff receiving sick pay it will help prevent closures and job loss

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
